summary: This document is an FBI 302 form summarizing a witness interview conducted via Webex on November 2, 2021, in preparation for trial testimony. The witness, referred to as 'DM', provides details about her recruitment, a trip to New Mexico involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, and an incident of sexual abuse during a massage. The document clarifies previously undisclosed or different recollections.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Discussed as having a relationship with the witness's boyfriend ('II'), paying for a trip to New Mexico, and being present during a massage where sexual abuse occurred.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as collecting the witness from the airport, hosting her in New Mexico, introducing her to 'professional massage', and participating in the sexual abuse during the massage.

persons.name: Annie
persons.context: A person the witness ('DM') communicates with about once a month. They have spoken about revisiting memories of the events but not in detail.

connections.description: Maxwell recruited DM, hosted her on a trip to New Mexico, introduced her to a massage, and participated in sexually abusing her during that massage.
Epstein paid for DM's trip to New Mexico and was present in the room during a massage where she was sexually abused. He or Maxwell touched her breasts.
Epstein had a relationship with II and was 'opening doors' for him. This relationship made the witness (DM) feel she couldn't disclose the abuse.
II was DM's boyfriend at the time of the events described. She felt confused and awkward about the abuse because of Epstein's relationship with II.
DM communicates with Annie about once a month. They have spoken about how strange it is to revisit memories but have not gone into detail.
Both were involved in orchestrating DM's trip to New Mexico and were present during the sexual abuse incident in the massage room.

events.title: Witness Interview for Trial Prep
events.description: An FBI interview conducted via Webex with witness 'DM' to prepare for trial testimony, clarifying her recollections of events involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Trip to New Mexico
events.description: A trip for which Jeffrey Epstein paid. DM was collected from the airport by Ghislaine Maxwell, who hosted her at a luxurious ranch. During this trip, DM was introduced to a 'professional massage' which led to sexual abuse.

events.title: Sexual Abuse During Massage in New Mexico
events.description: During a massage at the New Mexico ranch, Ghislaine Maxwell began giving DM a massage and touched her breasts. Jeffrey Epstein entered the room unexpectedly. DM is unsure if Epstein or Maxwell was the one who touched her.

events.title: Initial Phone Call Regarding Testimony
events.description: A brief, non-substantive phone call to discuss the logistics of testifying at trial and trial preparation.

keyFacts: Witness DM describes a trip to a ranch in New Mexico, paid for by Jeffrey Epstein, where she was hosted by Ghislaine Maxwell.

During this trip, Ghislaine Maxwell introduced DM to a 'professional massage,' which escalated into sexual abuse where DM's breasts were touched. Jeffrey Epstein was present in the room during this incident.
DM felt unable to tell her boyfriend ('II') about an earlier abusive incident in New York because of Jeffrey Epstein's beneficial relationship with him.
The document is an FBI 302 form summarizing witness interview notes, indicating it is part of official law enforcement preparation for a trial, likely the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The witness's recollections were clarified during this interview, suggesting evolving or previously undisclosed details were being formally recorded for the trial.
